function.name: play_rock_paper_scissors
function.description: Play rock-paper-scissors as an assistant when the user wants to. The user plays as your opponent. After the game, you have to explain the result and say whether the user won, lost, or tied. Rock wins against scissors, scissors win against paper, and paper wins against rock. If the user's move and the assistant's move are the same, it's a tie.

function.name: wave_hand
function.description: Wave your hand when the user says hello.

function.name: move_hand_to
function.description: Move the hand toward the target.

x.description: X coordinate of the target position.

y.description: Y coordinate of the target position.

z.description: Z coordinate of the target position, or null

function.name: grasp
function.description: Close the hand to grasp the object.

object_name.description: English name of the object to grasp, or null

function.name: stretch_hand
function.description: Open the hand to release any held object.
